title: 192A.39 PRINCIPALS.
text:
Any person subject to this code who:
(1) commits an offense punishable by this code, or aids, abets, counsels, commands, or procures its commission; or
(2) causes an act to be done which if directly performed by that person would be punishable by this code;
is a principal and shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
